workflow.description:
Project Type - Est. Total > 50,000 or any line > 50,000 or exceeds Linking SO Projected Cost requires Site Manager approval - Est. Total > 100,000 or any line > 50,000 or exceeds Linking SO Projected Cost requires Finance Management approval and e-mail sent to Finance Management
Inventory Type - always goes to Site Manager approval - Est. Total > 25,000 requires Division Head approval - Est. Total > 50,000 requires Finance Management approval and e-mail sent to Finance Management
Fixed Assets and Prepaids - always goes to Site Manager approval - Est. Total > 10,000 requires Division Head approval and e-mail sent to Finance Management - Est, Total > 25,000 requires Finance Management approval
Other - Est. Total > 500 requires Ops Lead Management Approval - Est. Total > 2,000 requires Site Manager Approval - Est. Total > 10,000 requires Division Head approval and e-mail sent to Finance Management - Est. Total > 25,000 requires Finance Management approval
workflow.name: Kodella | Requisition Approval

returnusererroraction.errortext: You cannot send this purchase order for approval because you currently have no assigned supervisor. Please take steps to have a supervisor added to your employee record, and try again.

initcondition.formula: ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1","PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3") ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type4") AND ( "Estimated Total" > 50000.00 OR "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 1 ))
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 0 AND "Estimated Total" <= 50000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2") AND "Estimated Total" <= 500.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Estimated Total" > 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Estimated Total" > 10000.00 )

( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Estimated Total" <= 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Estimated Total" <= 10000.00 ) OR (( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type5") ) AND ( "Estimated Total" <= 100000.00 AND "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 0 ))
"Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND ( "Estimated Total" > 10000.00 OR "Workflow:Line Exceeds Amount" = 1 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Estimated Total" > 50000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Estimated Total" > 25000.00 )
( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1") AND "Estimated Total" > 25000.00 ) OR ( "Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3","PO/Requisition Type4") AND "Estimated Total" > 10000.00 )
"Type" IN ("PO/Requisition Type1","PO/Requisition Type2","PO/Requisition Type3") AND isChecked("Workflow:Required CFO Approval") = 'F'
